job_description:
Job Title

QA Lead (5–7 Years)

Alternate Titles

QA Manager, Test Lead

Company Name

NewAgeSys IT, (a division of NewAgeSys, Inc.)

Location

Carnival Infopark, Phase 2, Kakkanad, Kochi

Job Type

Onsite

Shift Timing

11 AM - 8 PM IST, Monday to Friday

About the Company

NewAgeSys IT, a division of NewAgeSys, Inc. established in 1994, specializes in mobile app development and consulting. Based in New Jersey, the company helps clients maximize the reach and effectiveness of their business by leveraging the latest technology. They primarily serve clients in the USA. Visit www.newagesys.com and www.newagesysit.com for more information.

Key Responsibilities

  • Lead and mentor a team of QA engineers and testers (~10 members)
  • Define, implement, and maintain QA processes, standards, and best practices for web and mobile app projects
  • Develop and execute test strategies (functional, regression, integration, performance, automation testing)
  • Collaborate with Project, Development, and DevOps teams
  • Manage test planning, test case design, execution, and defect management
  • Evaluate and recommend automation frameworks, tools, and technologies
  • Ensure QA involvement throughout the SDLC (Agile/Scrum methodologies)
  • Conduct root cause analysis and provide continuous feedback to prevent recurring issues

Requirements

  • 5–8 years of QA experience with 2+ years in a leadership role
  • Strong knowledge of manual and automated testing methodologies
  • Hands-on experience with test automation tools: Selenium, Cypress, Playwright, Appium, JUnit, TestNG
  • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and build tools (Jenkins, Maven, Gradle)
  • Experience with API testing tools (Postman, RestAssured) and performance testing tools (JMeter, Gatling)
  • Knowledge of cloud-based testing (AWS, Azure, GCP) is a plus
  • Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills

Nice to Have

  • Experience in Agile/Scrum environments
  • Exposure to security testing and DevOps practices
  • ISTQB or similar certification

Contact

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, share your updated resume at career@newagesysindia.com.
summary: Lead QA team to ensure quality in web and mobile apps through testing strategies and automation tools. Requires 5–7 years experience with leadership and technical expertise in test automation frameworks.

job_description:
Senior Accountant Location: Koratty (Infopark) Experience: 3–6 Years Job Type: Full-time

Job Summary

We are seeking a proactive, detail-oriented Senior Accountant to manage our financial operations with a heavy focus on cash flow forecasting and receivables management. Beyond standard compliance and reporting, the ideal candidate will be responsible for predicting income/expenses based on active Invoices and Purchase Orders (POs) and ensuring the timely collection of pending payments to maintain healthy liquidity.

Key Responsibilities

  • Forecasting & Cash Flow: Develop and maintain accurate financial forecasts by analyzing Invoices, POs, and historical data to predict future income and expenses.
  • Receivables & Collections: Take ownership of the accounts receivable process; track pending payments, follow up with clients, and ensure high collection efficiency.
  • SEZ & Statutory Compliance: Ensure full compliance with SEZ regulations (Softex, Serf) and handle all related filings accurately.
  • Taxation & Filings: Manage timely filing for GST, TDS, ESI, and PF, ensuring strict adherence to Indian tax and labor laws.
  • Financial Reporting: Perform month-end closing, bank reconciliations, and prepare accurate P&L statements and Balance Sheets.
  • Payroll: Oversee end-to-end payroll processing, including salary calculations and statutory deductions.
  • Audit Coordination: Collaborate with internal and external auditors for smooth compliance checks.

Qualifications & Skills

  • Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Accounting or Finance.
  • Experience: 3–6 years of relevant experience, preferably within an SEZ company or a fast-paced startup environment.
  • Software: Proficiency in Tally or QuickBooks. Strong familiarity with Zoho Books is highly preferred.
  • Analytical Rigor: Proven ability to forecast budgets and manage working capital.
  • Communication: Excellent interpersonal skills for professional yet firm payment collections and internal reporting.

Why Join Us?

At Koncepts Lab, you will play a pivotal role in the financial health of a growing startup, with the autonomy to implement best practices in financial planning and recovery.

How to Apply

Interested candidates can send their resume to hr@konceptslab.com with the subject “Application for Senior Accountant”.
summary: Senior Accountant role focused on cash flow forecasting, receivables management, and statutory compliance. Requires 3–6 years of experience with expertise in Tally/QuickBooks and strong analytical skills.

job_description:
About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, with 2350+ employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries. We develop innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defence, and industrial sectors. Committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance, our 'Orange Spirit' embodies team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work environment. Since 2024, in-tech has become a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd, enhancing our ability to deliver comprehensive development and digitalisation services with offshore capabilities.

We are seeking experienced Automotive Test Engineers to join our team in Kochi, India, with hybrid work options. If you’re passionate about joining a growing, dynamic team with a positive culture, we’d love to connect with you! #Immediate candidates are preferred.

Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with European engineering testing teams to conduct tests using remote access to HIL systems.
  • Develop, write, and implement new test cases for automotive systems.
  • Execute automated test suites and design new test scenarios as required.
  • Review and interpret system test data across infotainment, HUD, vehicle architecture, headlights, and chassis domains.
  • Analyze testing data, perform root cause analysis, and recommend corrective actions.
  • Ensure alignment between design requirements and validation results.
  • Document software defects using tracking systems and report defects to stakeholders.
  • Prepare detailed analysis reports for stakeholders and communicate findings to design and testing teams.
  • Utilize tools like CANape, ControlDesk, DOORS, Jira, INCA, and other automotive industry tools.
  • Work with engineers in foreign locations to test ECUs per established procedures and performance targets.
  • Propose improvements to test efficiency and methodologies.

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in systems, software, or electrical engineering (or related field).
  • 2–4 years of experience in analysis or validation roles across automotive systems, including HIL testing.
  • Strong understanding of automotive electronics, mechanical systems, and vehicle testing methods.
  • Knowledge of diagnostics (ISO 14229) and OBD (J1939) standards.
  • Familiarity with protocols like CAN, LIN, Ethernet and tools like CANalyzer, CANoe, dSPACE Control Desk, INCA, Vector Tools, EXAM, DOORS.
  • Experience with Python and CAPL scripting is a plus.
  • Knowledge of defect tracking systems like ALM Octane and KPM is advantageous.
  • Experience with test automation and requirements management tools is beneficial.
  • Ability to interpret functional requirements, analyze datasets, and identify patterns/issues.
  • Strong technical documentation and reporting skills.
  • Independent, proactive work style with cross-cultural communication skills.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication abilities.

Apply with Us

If you have experience and team spirit, start your journey with us! We are committed to diversity and equal employment opportunity, regardless of age, race, gender, disability, or other protected categories.

#Immediate candidates are preferred.

Apply at: https://in-tech.com/en/carrers/jobs/automotive-test-engineer-1986 Email: india.talent@in-tech.com
summary: Seeking an Automotive Test Engineer with 2-4 years of experience in HIL testing and automotive systems validation. Requires expertise in CAN protocols, defect tracking, and cross-team collaboration for global projects.

Serving startups through Fortune 500 enterprises across multiple industries and geographies, Cascade operates globally with headquarters in Sarasota, Florida, and offices in Toronto, London, and Kochi, India.

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Engineer with strong expertise in Django and React to join our growing engineering team. Company Overview

At iBoson Innovations (P) Ltd, we push the boundaries of Augmented Reality (AR) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to build next-gen solutions. Located at ACE 1, 3rd Floor, CDAC Building, Technopark Campus, Kazhakootam, Thiruvananthapuram, we are expanding our team and seeking a skilled Full Stack Developer to join our engineering-driven culture.

Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain both front-end and back-end web applications using Angular and Node.js.
  • Develop and integrate RESTful APIs services to support front-end applications and backend services.
  • Optimize application performance, security, and reliability.
  • Design and manage databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB).
  • Collaborate with frontend, product, and DevOps teams.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code.
  • Review code and mentor junior engineers.
  • Participate in architecture and technical decision-making.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve production issues.
  • Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver user experiences and meet deadlines.

Preferred Skills

  • 5+ years of full-stack development experience with Angular, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript.
  • Strong backend development expertise in Node.js, including REST APIs, middleware, and microservices.
  • Extensive front-end framework experience (e.g., Angular component architecture, state management, performance optimization).
  • Database proficiency in SQL (MySQL/PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB), including design and query optimization.
  • Expertise in Git version control and branching strategies.
  • Mastery of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).
  • Test-driven development (TDD) and CI/CD practices.
  • Front-end optimization techniques (bundling, lazy loading, caching).

  • Challenging, high-impact projects in AR and AI.
  • Learning and career growth opportunities.
  • Collaborative culture focused on innovation and problem-solving.

How to Apply

Send your resume to career@ibosoninnov.com.
